column5: Saw this posted on another board, thought I'd share it with you guys... If you buy an ABU GARCIA PRODUCT (depending on what it is) one of the coupons will get you something...  http://www.abugarcia.com/coupon.php
christ! I just realized, its open to US RESIDENTS ONLY!! Grrrrrrrrr... guess we're too damn polite these days!!  Maybe you can send it to a FRIEND or FAMILY MEMBER you may have in the states?
Aside from the Ambassaduer's for down rigging, I've been thoroughly dissatisfied with Abu Garcia products.
